meta.report_title: Horizon Strategis 2025-2026: Divergensi Makroekonomi & Supercycle Komoditas

japan_economy.implication: Risk to Asian export volume; BoJ rate hike limitation

fiscal_health.analysis: Strong fiscal headroom allowing for aggressive resource nationalism policies without capital flight risk

gold_export_tax.mechanism: Progressive Tariff based on HMA (Harga Mineral Acuan)
gold_export_tax.strategic_intent: Force domestic refining (hilirisasi) & capture windfall profits

coal_export_tax.strategic_intent: Domestic Market Obligation (DMO) enforcement & revenue optimization

corporate_strategy_matrix.name: United Tractors (Agincourt)
corporate_strategy_matrix.action: Initiating multisourcing talks with ANTM & HRTA
corporate_strategy_matrix.trajectory_2026: Securing margin stability via domestic offtake

corporate_strategy_matrix.name: Merdeka Copper Gold / MGR
corporate_strategy_matrix.action: Pani Project first gold pour Q1 2026; coincides with tax implementation
corporate_strategy_matrix.trajectory_2026: Critical need for domestic buyer to maximize Pani project IRR

corporate_strategy_matrix.name: J Resources
corporate_strategy_matrix.action: Current structure 83% export (Metalor Singapore); needs urgent restructuring
corporate_strategy_matrix.trajectory_2026: Potential 15% revenue leakage if export reliance continues

corporate_strategy_matrix.name: Archi Indonesia
corporate_strategy_matrix.action: Kopra Underground ops late 2025; targeting IDR 2T profit in 2026
corporate_strategy_matrix.trajectory_2026: Volume recovery key to offsetting potential tax drag

infrastructure_and_expansion.name: Elnusa
infrastructure_and_expansion.action: Seismic survey contracts in Thailand; Domestic contracts IDR 3.8T

consumer_and_media_divergence.name: MD Entertainment
